SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.repository

Class SkillRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.repository.SkillRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SkillRepository extends Object implements Serializable
The SkillRepository class manages a collection of skills. It provides methods for adding, validating, and retrieving skills.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SkillRepository

      public SkillRepository()
      Constructs a SkillRepository object. Initializes the list of skills.

  • Method Details

    • addSkillRep

      public boolean addSkillRep(Skill skill)
      Adds a skill to the repository.
      Parameters:
      skill - The skill to add
      Returns:
      True if the skill was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • validateSkill

      public boolean validateSkill(Skill skill)
      Validates a skill before adding it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      skill - The skill to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the skill didn't exist in the repository and can be added, false otherwise.

    • printAllSkill

      public void printAllSkill()
      Prints all skills in the repository.

    • getSkills

      public Optional<List<Skill>> getSkills()
      Retrieves all skills from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list containing all skills.

    • serializateData

      public void serializateData()
      Serializes the SkillRepository object to a file. The repository is saved to a file named after the class with a ".bin" extension. This method handles the serialization process and writes the object state to a file.

    • getSeralizatedData

      public void getSeralizatedData()
      Deserializes the SkillRepository object from a file and adds the skills to the current repository. The repository is read from a file named after the class with a ".bin" extension. This method handles the deserialization process and reads the object state from a file.
